title: Stuck at 60fps
body: My fps is capped at 60 fps. Changing the graphics settings doesn't alter it either, please halp.

replies.body:
_Plaise halp _ is the magic word, and I'm always happy to come in and help with a big badaboom.  Like big, bada big boom.  Your fps issue might be due to a driver or third party issue, so I recommend using a multipass known as the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to fix this up.  If you have Windows 10, you can also disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto-enabled in a recent update and causing issues like this.  Now you know, it's a multipass!

http://i.imgur.com/xKccwPP.gif
Turning off the game bar was the problem my good sir. Papa Bless <3
